quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: A true relationship is two imperfect people refusing to give up on each other.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In a relationship, when communication starts to fade, everything else follows.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Nat King Cole

quotes.quote: A great relationship is about two things: First, appreciating the similarities, and second, respecting the differences.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A strong relationship requires choosing to love each other even in those moments when you struggle to like each other.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Relationships are the hallmark of the mature person.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is an endless act of love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best relationships are the ones you never saw coming.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: You come to love not by finding the perfect person, but by seeing an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree but still hold hands.
quotes.author: Alexandra Penney

quotes.quote: A relationship is like a house. When a lightbulb burns out, you don't go and buy a new house, you fix the light bulb.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: The extent to which two people in a relationship can bring up and resolve issues is a critical marker of the soundness of a relationship.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: A relationship is like a garden. It requires tender care and nurturing. Without it, it withers away.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A healthy relationship will never require you to sacrifice your friends, your dreams, or your dignity.
quotes.author: Dinkar Kalotra

quotes.quote: Intimacy is not purely physical; it's the act of connecting with someone so deeply, you feel like you can see into their soul.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you want a relationship that looks and feels like the most amazing thing on earth, you need to treat it like it is the most amazing thing on earth.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it, but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: To get the full value of joy, you must have someone to divide it with.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
quotes.author: Doménico Cieri Estrada

quotes.quote: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day.
quotes.author: André Maurois

quotes.quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: You don't develop courage by being happy in your relationships every day. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The most memorable people in life will be the friends who loved you when you weren't very lovable.
quotes.author: Aidan Chambers

quotes.quote: The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: True love is not about perfection, it is hidden in flaws.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Love is not what you say. Love is what you do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The greatest relationships are the ones you never expected to be in.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: In a strong relationship, you should love your companion more than anything else, with all the beauty and imperfections.
quotes.author: Unknown
